data.title: Alps Alpine North America
data.meta_description: Alps Alpine North America is a partner for the leading IoT Conference & Exhibition; IoT Tech Expo North America in Silicon Valley
data.text:
Alps Alpine, a leading manufacturer of electronic components and automotive infotainment systems, has brought the world numerous “First 1” and “Number 1” products since its founding in 1948. The Alps Alpine Group currently operates 110 bases in 26 countries and regions, supplying roughly 40,000 different products and solutions to around 2,000 companies worldwide.

In January 2019, Alps Electric Co., Ltd. and Alpine Electronics, Inc. integrated their businesses to embark on a new era as Alps Alpine Co., Ltd. and has established a leading role in the logistic segment in the recent years by connecting (non-)powered assets (trailers, waste containers, returnable packaging, refrigerated trucks) to the Internet of Things (IoT). We provide a reliable, mature solution in an immature market.

Our solution creates transparent data in supply chain and logistics processes where there was none before. There are billions of assets traveling around the world each day. Either these assets contain valuable content, or they play a crucial role in a supply chain or logistics process.

https://www.alpsalpine-assettracking.com
